start.subtitle: Configure a back up Tangem card
start.description: This xApp will allow you to configure a XUMM Tangem card to work as an additional signing method to another XRP Ledger account which will work as a back-up. It will set a Regular Key from an activated XRPL account to a XUMM Tangem card account.
start.list_item_1: An XRPL account that has been activated and has been imported into Xaman
start.list_item_2: A XUMM Tangem card that has been imported into Xaman. (does NOT need to be activated)

step_1.body: This step will let you select your primary XRPL account. This is the account a back up card will be configured on.

step_2.body: Sign with the back up account (Tangem card).

wizard.success: Card configured as back up card

info.title: Info
info.text: Some users might want to remove the secret keys of the main account from Xaman, you can do that by setting the Main Account to Read only (If the Main account is not a Tangem card), You can always sign with either the Main account or the Back Up (regular key)

error.title: Oops
error.hasRegularKey: This account already has a RegularKey (back up account) set
error.equalAccounts: You selected the same XRPL account (card) as source and destination
error.notTangem: The account you selected does not belong to a Tangem card, please try again
error.dissabledMasterkey: Master Key is disabled on your Tangem card: you cannot use this wizard
error.changeRegularKey: This account already has a Regular Key (back up account) set. If you continue the back up account will be replaced (overwritten)
error.invalidParams: One or more fields are specified incorrectly, or one or more required fields are missing.
error.lgrNotFound: The ledger specified by the ledger_hash or ledger_index does not exist, or it does exist but the server does not have it.
error.actNotFound: The Address specified in the account field of the request does not correspond to an account in the ledger.
error.temDISABLED: Occurs if the DeletableAccounts amendment is not enabled.
error.temDST_IS_SRC: Occurs if the Destination matches the sender of the transaction (Account field).
error.tecDST_TAG_NEEDED: Occurs if the Destination account requires a destination tag, but the DestinationTag field was not provided.
error.tecNO_DST: Occurs if the Destination account is not a funded account in the ledger.
error.tecNO_PERMISSION: Occurs if the Destination account requires deposit authorization and the sender is not preauthorized.
error.tecTOO_SOON: Occurs if the sender's Sequence number is too high. The transaction's Sequence number plus 256 must be less than the current Ledger Index.
error.tecHAS_OBLIGATIONS: Occurs if the account to be deleted is connected to objects that cannot be deleted in the ledger. (This includes objects created by other accounts, such as escrows.)
error.tefTOO_BIG: Occurs if the sending account is linked to more than 1000 objects in the ledger. The transaction could succeed on retry if some of those objects were deleted separately first.
